meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Cambodia.
meanings.sent1: In Cambodia, you can buy many things with just one riel.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for riel at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The riel in my pocket decided to take a vacation and go on a trip around Cambodia.
meanings.sent4: The riel danced in the air, shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The riel jingled happily in the vendor's hand.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Cambodia, equal to 100 sen.
meanings.sent1: She saved up enough riels to buy a new bicycle.
meanings.sent2: The price of the item was 500 riels.
meanings.sent3: The riel and the sen had a race to see who was faster.
meanings.sent4: His words were like riels, each one carrying weight and value.
meanings.sent5: The riel sparkled like a tiny gem in the palm of her hand.

meanings.definition: A type of currency used in Cambodia.
meanings.sent1: The market only accepted payment in riels.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often need to exchange their currency for riels when visiting Cambodia.
meanings.sent3: The riel and the dollar had a conversation about their travels.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of riels.
meanings.sent5: The riel slipped through his fingers like grains of sand.
